vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.6;
son of: Ashhur (H0806) and Naarah (H5292B);
brother of: Ahuzzam (H0275), Hepher (H2660) and Temeni (H8488);
half-brother of: Zereth (H6889), Izhar (H3328), Ethnan (H0869) and Koz (H6976)
§ Haahashtari = "I will diligently observe the searching"
a descendant of Ashur of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ashur; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈轄斯他利 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在波斯文的意思是 "我要勤於觀看尋覓"
猶大的後裔, 亞施戶的兒子 (代上 4:6)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈辖斯他利 这个阳性专有名词 人名在波斯文的意思是 "我要勤于观看寻觅"
犹大的后裔, 亚施户的儿子 (代上 4:6)
